thread.title: BRIEF-Greenlight Capital Takes Share Stake In Michael Kors, Under Armour Class A Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Greenlight Capital Takes Share Stake In Michael Kors, Under Armour Class A Shares
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Greenlight Capital Inc:
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 48,250 SHARES IN MICHAEL KORS HOLDINGS LTD - SEC FILING
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 452,500 CLASS A SHARES IN UNDER ARMOUR INC
* GREENLIGHT CAPITAL INC - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 (Source For the quarter ended Dec 31, 2017 bit.ly/2nZmLXw ) (Source For the quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 bit.ly/2nH0Owu ) Further company coverage:
